article_title: In federal shutdown, deciding who’s essential is essentially a guess
article_text: The websites that offer information about President Obama’s health care law survived the government shutdown – even with glitches. But a federal website featuring information about the Amber Alert went dark. Make any sense? Hardly. No one really knows who has an essential mission in the federal government and who doesn’t.

article_summary:
But a federal website featuring information about the Amber Alert went dark.
The websites that offer information about President Obama’s health care law survived the government shutdown – even with glitches.
No one really knows who has an essential mission in the federal government and who doesn’t.
Make any sense?
